item.description:
Cinema City at the Palace has released the next few weekends' schedule for Cinema Classics. These movies cost only $5 per ticket ($4 for Criterion Club members) and show at 11:00am on Saturday and Sunday. I will choose one of the days and if you can't go on that day and want to go the other day, feel free.  The start time is always 10:45am because they show the movies promptly at 11:00am with no trailers.

 

"The Birds" - Alfred Hitchcock's classic 1963 film starring Tippi Hedren, Suzanne Peshette, Rod Taylor, Jessica Tandy, and Veronica Cartwright.

From IMDB:  "A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people there in increasing numbers and with increasing viciousness."

119 minutes.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "The Birds" @ Cinema Classics
